<L>10546<pc>666-1<k1>सूतपुत्र<k2>सूतपुत्र<h>2
{@Sūtaputra@}<sup>2</sup>¦ = Karṇa: I, †198, 5221 ({%Rādheyaḥ%}), 5222, 5423,
5424; II, 1712 ({%Rādheyaḥ%}), †2386; III, †233, 1430, 1648,
8285 ({%K°%}), †10280, †14761, 14894, 14909, 14911, 15214,
15215, 15273, 15333, 15346, 15350 ({%K°%}), 15374, 17166
({%°tvaṃ%}), †17217, 17244; IV, 1629 ({%K°%}), †1664, †1678
({%Vaikartanaḥ%}), †1694, 2244; V, †31, 217, 222, †755, †850,
†1812, 1944, 1953, 1958, 2290, †2425, 2829, 4357, 4727,
4928, 5301, 5502, 5547, 5599, 5663, 5706, 7577; VI, †1272,
1614, 4404, 4406, 4410, 4455 ({%Rādheye%}); VII, 34 ({%Rādheyaṃ%}),
48 (do.), †52, 184, 533, 1434, 1439, 3539, 4412 ({%°purogamāḥ%}),
5298, 5361, 5363, 5365, 5369, 5371, 5378, 5382, 5387, 5392,
5408, 5436, 5451, 5479, 5508, 5510, 5517, 5524, 5525, 5531,
5573, 5580, 5586, 5589, 5600, 5601, 5627, 5633, 5697, 5700,
5702, 5703, 5712, 5713, 5716, 5717, 5737, 5742, 5749, 5753,
5759, 5762, 5780, 5803, 6116, 6118, 6120, 6125, 6395 ({%K°%}),
6981, 6989, 7042, 7054, 7066, 7069, 7070, 7076, 7085, 7086,
7087, 7097, 7100, 7643, 7654, 7676, 7761, 7784, 7793, 7811,
7812, 7825, 7826, 7839, 7844, 7932, 7934, 7935, 7939, 7946,
7949, 7956, 7957, 7965, 7984, 7985, 7990, †8137, †8158,
†8167, 8217, 8249, †8256, 8280, 8332, 8341 ({%sānugaḥ%}), 8342,
8343, 8348, 8350, 8355, 8363, 8682, 8889, 8902; VIII, 5,
33, 136 ({%Rādheyaḥ%}), †199 ({%vadhaṃ S°sya%}), 262 ({%hate%}), 335,
382, 408, 431, 491, 829 ({%°mukhāḥ%}), 923, 944, 945, 948, 965,
